sources.title: Dao hun
sources.description: Title: Dao hun Summary: An all star cast grace the sceen in this lavish martial art picture from Goldig Films. A rogue swordsman known as "Soul of the Sword" kills the father of a young Kung Fu expert, who teams ... Directed by: Peng-Yi Chang Actors: Sing Chen, Fei Meng, Chun Production Company: Galaxy Film Company Ltd. Release Date: 29 December 1977 (Taiwan) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 An all star cast grace the sceen in this lavish martial art picture from Goldig Films. A rogue swordsman known as "Soul of the Sword" kills the father of a young Kung Fu expert, who teams up with a Drunken Master to put an end to Soul of the Sword's reign of terror, and thwart the Mongol invasion. Brillaint swordplay kung fu action from Taiwan'a formost wu-xia director, Chang Peng Yi.

metadata.Plot: An all star cast grace the sceen in this lavish martial art picture from Goldig Films.
